title: Schlafly Bottleworks
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Uses mostly local food and produce grown in their garden. Offers a variety of vegan options, including pizza and a yellow curry made with Mofu, Missouri-made tofu. Also uses Match meat alternative which can be used as a substitute in many other dishes on the menu. Staff is accommodating. Hosts a farmers market during the warm months, with vendors selling everything from fresh produce and herbs to bread and chocolate, much of which is vegan.
